headline: NRG Energy, Inc. Announces Pricing of Senior Secured Notes and Senior Unsecured Notes
summary: HOUSTON, September 24, 2025--NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG) has priced its concurrent offerings of (1) senior secured first lien notes (the "Secured Notes Offering"), consisting of (i) $625 million aggregate principal amount of 4.734% senior secured first lien notes due 2030 (the "2030 Notes") and (ii) $625 million aggregate principal amount of 5.407% senior secured first lien notes due 2035 (the "2035 Notes" and, together with the 2030 Notes, the "Secured Notes") and (2) senior unsecured notes (th
